nodes.text: Thermajugs were devices which could make hot tea. The couple Shirene and Esmelle owned a thermajug in their home on the planet Akiva, and when Esmelle's sister Norra Wexley visited shortly before the Rebellion on Akiva, Shirene sent Esmelle to the kitchen, where their thermajug was on the stovetop, to make some tea with the device in order to break up an argument between the sisters.

A thermajug first appeared in "Whispers in the Dark," a Star Wars Legends short story written by Charlene Newcomb and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 2 in 1994. The device was confirmed to be canon when it was mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
